abstract.p: Beth Kopley letter questions why Rob Tannenbaum's June 4 article on Diane Warren focused on fact that she has not been in relationship for long time0

block.p: Why does Rob Tannenbaum, in his fascinating article on Diane Warren (June 4), zero in on the fact that she has not been in a relationship for a long time? I wish Warren the best in her career and hope that someday -- but not a moment before she is ready -- she will fall in love, too.
Not everyone finds success in career and a relationship, and they rarely coincide. Stop holding women to an outdated measure that demands success in the private and public arenas simultaneously.
